basics.name: Patrick Woodburn
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A software engineer passionate about emerging technology that allows users to interact with the world around them.

work.summary: Designing and developmenting home security and home automation systems.
highlights: Operating within a team of developers to develop and test a new home automation system
Working with on internet connected devices to automate and secure users' homes.

work.summary: Teaching robotics to high school students
highlights: Planning lessons on the topics of electrical and software development.
Teaching students how to program and build circuitry required for multiple applications of robotics.

work.summary: Writing secure access software for customers to access their person private Insurance information.
highlights: Implementing given designs so that users may have the most comfortable experience possible when accessing their insurance information.

work.summary: Developed Linux-based software to run on industrial organic digester
highlights: Developed software to run on headless industrial machnery and preform analytics on their use.
Set up and maintained Linux devices to be used in embedded industrial applications.

volunteer.summary: Developed Open source software for the betterment of conditions in Philadelphia
highlights: Acted as a subject matter expert on developing API's and integrating them into web and mobile apps.

education.institution: Harrisburg University Of Science And Technology
